values:
birthday party!!
tomorrow (friday) purington basment kitchen 7:30
promises of cake, possibly a pinata
and adventures afterwards? 

all are invited! 

(cus i know its not just me who thinks luis is the cat's meow :O)

dani --
[adjective]:

Fuzzy to the touch

'How will you be defined in the dictionary?' at QuizGalaxy.com
yah, thats right. :O)

my love is building a building
around you, a frail slippery
house, a strong fragile house
(beginning at the singular beginning

of your smile)a skilful uncouth
prison, a precise clumsy
prison(building thatandthis into Thus,
Around the reckless magic of your mouth)

my love is building a magic, a discrete
tower of magic and(as i guess)

when Farmer Death(whom fairies hate)shall

crumble the mouth-flower fleet
He'll not my tower,
                   laborious, casual

where the surrounded smile
                          hangs
 
                               breathless

e.e.cummings

i like it when people type many exclamation points followed by the number one. 

you know the type :O)

but this place is still fun. also, let me entertain you with my cunning use of html: see how acurately m and delaney demonstrate my skills at img src? they sure are fun subjects. (ps, you farmington folk are few and far between. but not for long - fly august fly!)

an update. 

(oh livejournal, my poor neglected lover. 
oneday we shall sustain a steady relationship, 
but thatday is not today.) 

i merely post this morning to profess my undying affection for a few specificthings. farmingtonstyle. 
(and no, this will not be alphabetized, where's the whimsy in that?) 
this list is included but by no means limited to:

Ei's snowy hugs and latenight talks
m's knitting hand (and the way she holds her pencil) 
Gwen's eloquence (in writing and in speech)
Casey's phrase, "and i really like it!" 
Ken's closed eyes as he sings (and all of his music)
Josh's laugh ("Aha-ha!")
Gary's orange snowsuit (and all the sillyness it holds) 
Clean's wit, and his samurai stealth
Breaze's sunburn
Kevin's longcoat and little hat 
Scott's sextalks and obscure movie references
Dan Winsor's voice (sometimes i think the words are falling over themselves, but they are all ok)
Kira's mouthful of spinich
Dan Sweetzer's food faces
Jack Woods's high fives
Delany's meandering (or is it lollygagging?)
Caleb's little kid voice (singing spiderman)


"and i want life in every word
to the extent that its absurd..."

yay livejournal :o)
all the cool kids were doing it.

problem is, i dont know what the fuck im doing
theres time for livejournalcompetentcy i suppose. 

in the meantime, my xanga is more established (www.xanga.com/intherain)
and perhaps even more fun.
